item.title: India Globalization Capital Inc 10-K
item.description: India Globalization Capital Inc, which is in the Wholesale-Electronic Parts & Equipment, Nec [5065] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 23, 2022 had 30446 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 394 instances may - 268 instances stock - 209 instances 2022 - 193 instances financial - 179 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
